reuters.title: <PAGURIAN CORP LTD> YEAR NET
reuters.body: Shr 1.64 dlrs vs 90 cts Net 64.9 mln vs 28.8 mln Revs 73 mln vs 35 mln NOTE: Shares outstanding 39.5 mln vs 32.1 mln. Avg shrs not given. Company recently raised equity and voting interests in <Hees International Corp> to 13.4 pct and 16.1 pct, respectively. Reuter 
